verses.verse: Afterward <S%H310><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> came, <S%H3843><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> "This is what Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H1639><s%> says, <S%H559><s%> <S%H5971><s%> 'Let my people go, <S%H7971><s%> that they <S%H7503><s%> may hold a feast <S%H559><s%> to me in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>'"

Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Who is Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> that I should listen <S%H8085><s%> to his voice <S%H6963><s%> to let Israel <S%H3478><s%> go? <S%H7971><s%> I don't <S%H3045><s%> know Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and moreover I will not let Israel <S%H3478><s%> go. <S%H7971><s%>"

They said, <S%H559><s%> "The God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews <S%H5680><s%> has met <S%H7122><s%> with us. <S%H3212><s%> Please let us go three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>' journey <S%H1870><s%> into the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> lest he fall <S%H6293><s%> on us with pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> or with the sword. <S%H2719><s%>"

The king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H4872><s%> "Why do you, Moses and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> take <S%H6544><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> from their work? <S%H4639><s%> Get <S%H3212><s%> back to your burdens! <S%H5450><s%>"
Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H5971><s%> the people of the land <S%H776><s%> are now many, <S%H7227><s%> and you make them rest <S%H7673><s%> from their burdens. <S%H5450><s%>"
The same day <S%H3117><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the taskmasters <S%H5065><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and their officers, <S%H7860><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"You shall no longer give <S%H5414><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> to make <S%H3835><s%> brick, <S%H3843><s%> as before. <S%H8032><s%> Let them go <S%H3212><s%> and gather <S%H7197><s%> straw for themselves. <S%H8401><s%>

The number <S%H4971><s%> of the bricks, <S%H3843><s%> which they made <S%H6213><s%> before, <S%H8032><s%> you require <S%H7760><s%> from them. <S%H1639><s%> You shall not diminish anything of it, <S%H7503><s%> for they are idle; therefore they cry, <S%H6817><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'Let us go and sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to our God. <S%H430><s%>'

Let heavier work <S%H5656><s%> be laid <S%H3513><s%> on the men, <S%H582><s%> that they may labor <S%H6213><s%> therein; <S%H8159><s%> and don't let them pay any attention to lying <S%H8267><s%> words. <S%H1697><s%>"

The taskmasters <S%H5065><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> went out, <S%H3318><s%> and their officers, <S%H7860><s%> and they spoke <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "This is what Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> says: <S%H559><s%> <S%H5414><s%> 'I will not give you straw. <S%H8401><s%>

Go <S%H3212><s%> yourselves, <S%H3947><s%> get straw <S%H8401><s%> where <S%H834><s%> you can find <S%H4672><s%> it, <S%H3588><s%> for nothing <S%H1697><s%> of your work <S%H5656><s%> shall be diminished. <S%H1639><s%>'"
So the people <S%H5971><s%> were scattered abroad <S%H6327><s%> throughout all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to gather <S%H7197><s%> stubble <S%H7179><s%> for straw. <S%H8401><s%>

The taskmasters <S%H5065><s%> were urgent <S%H213><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Fulfill <S%H3615><s%> your work <S%H4639><s%> quota <S%H1697><s%> daily, <S%H3117><s%> as when there was <S%H1961><s%> straw! <S%H8401><s%>"

The officers <S%H7860><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whom Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s taskmasters <S%H5065><s%> had set <S%H7760><s%> over them, <S%H5221><s%> were beaten, and demanded, <S%H559><s%> "Why haven't <S%H3615><s%> you fulfilled your quota <S%H2706><s%> both yesterday <S%H8543><s%> and today, <S%H3117><s%> in making brick <S%H3835><s%> as before? <S%H8032><s%>"

Then the officers <S%H7860><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and cried <S%H6817><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Why do you deal <S%H6213><s%> this way with your servants? <S%H5650><s%>

No straw <S%H8401><s%> is given <S%H5414><s%> to your servants, <S%H5650><s%> and they tell <S%H559><s%> us, <S%H6213><s%> 'Make brick! <S%H3843><s%>' and behold, <S%H5650><s%> your servants are beaten; <S%H5221><s%> but the fault <S%H2398><s%> is in your own people. <S%H5971><s%>"
But he said, <S%H559><s%> "You are idle! <S%H7503><s%> You are idle! <S%H7503><s%> Therefore you say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'Let us go and sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>'

Go <S%H3212><s%> therefore now, <S%H5647><s%> and work, for no straw <S%H8401><s%> shall be given <S%H5414><s%> to you, <S%H5414><s%> yet you shall deliver the same number <S%H8506><s%> of bricks! <S%H3843><s%>"

The officers <S%H7860><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that they were in trouble, <S%H7451><s%> when it was said, <S%H559><s%> "You shall not diminish <S%H1639><s%> anything from your daily <S%H3117><s%> quota <S%H1697><s%> of bricks! <S%H3843><s%>"
They met <S%H6293><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> who stood <S%H5324><s%> in the way, <S%H7125><s%> as they came out <S%H3318><s%> from Pharaoh: <S%H6547><s%>

and they said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H3068><s%> "May Yahweh look <S%H7200><s%> at you, <S%H8199><s%> and judge, because you have made us a stench <S%H7381><s%> to be abhorred <S%H887><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of his servants, <S%H5650><s%> to put <S%H5414><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> in their hand <S%H3027><s%> to kill us. <S%H2026><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H136><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Lord, <S%H136><s%> why have you brought trouble <S%H7489><s%> on this people? <S%H5971><s%> Why is it that you have sent me? <S%H7971><s%>

For since I came <S%H935><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> in your name, <S%H8034><s%> he has brought trouble <S%H7489><s%> on this people; <S%H5971><s%> neither have you delivered <S%H5337><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> at all. <S%H5337><s%>"
